sentence.Network_en: This valley is just one long smorgasbord.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个小镇只能成为怪物的长期自助餐厅.

sentence.Network_en: I think most people have probably heard of a smorgasbord before.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想大部分人都听过瑞典式自助餐.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 为的就是这一顿传统的瑞典自助餐(smorgasbord)。侍者会建议你选择何种酒，在像“节目单”一样的菜单的左边，有吃自助餐的7条要点…
英语词汇新译 S_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... smoothness 平滑 smorgasbord 瑞典式自助餐 smote 重击.
它让我想起瑞典的一种自助大餐（smorgasbord），在这种斯堪的纳维亚半岛的自助餐当中，有各式各样令人垂涎欲滴的菜肴任你选择 …
...夫，Dalio表示，人生的目标就如一大盘多采多姿的美点（smorgasbord）摆在餐桌上任君选择，你无需要也不可能每样美点都去品 …

list.abs: finally , smorgasbord of interior adjustments is available , including a rear desk and curtains . other goodies include custom steering wheels and unique trim elements across the dash .最后，自助餐的内部调整的情况下，包括后方台和窗帘。其他的物品，包括自定义方向盘和独特的装饰元素在破折号。
you can enjoy a sexual smorgasbord ., 你可以享受各种性经历.
3. smorgasbord (瑞典式)自助餐a smorgasbord of 有很多种类的，多种多样的We have a smorgasbord of drinks: beer,wine,cocktai.
help yourself from the smorgasbord .请随便用自助餐。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Swedish, from smörgås ('slice of) bread and butter' (from smör 'butter' + gås 'goose, lump of butter') + bord 'table'

entry.tran: (有各式冷热开胃菜的)斯堪的纳维亚式自助餐;丰盛的餐前小吃;丰盛的自助餐
entry.def: Smorgasbord is a meal with a variety of hot and cold savoury dishes, from which people serve themselves.
A smorgasbord of things is a number of different things that are combined together as a whole.

example.ex: ...Further Education colleges with a smorgasbord of academic and vocational courses.
example.tran: 提供广泛的学科课程和职业培训课程的进修学院

means.word_mean: 1. a collection containing a variety of sorts of things;

sentences.sentence: "a great assortment of cars was on display"

means.word_mean: 2. an assortment of foods starting with herring or smoked eel or salmon etc with bread and butter; then cheeses and eggs and pickled vegetables and aspics; finally hot foods; served as a buffet meal

auth_sentence.content: Swedes call their Christmas dinner julbord, and it is a version of the Swedish buffet-style smorgasbord.
